articles.description: Oberoi Realty, Zydus Lifesciences, Prestige Estates, Thermax, Nykaa parent FSN E-Commerce Ventures, Alkem Laboratories and Steel Authority of India (SAIL) need up to 10% rise to enter the MSCI index.
articles.content: Vodafone Idea shares have become qualified to be included in the MSCI Global Standard index in its August review, according to Nuvama Institutional Equities. The addition in the index is likely to at… [+3550 chars]

articles.author: Nikhil Agarwal
articles.title: Should Nifty bulls 'sell in May and go away', not return until election result day? - The Economic Times
articles.description: Nervousness on Dalal Street as Nifty bulls debate 'Sell in May and go away'. Positive April returns trigger unease. US Fed meeting hints at rate cut projection. Analysts advise capitalizing on Nifty dips for buying opportunities.
articles.content: With Nifty hitting a hat-trick of three consecutive months of positive returns in April, nervousness is increasing on Dalal Street with naysayers reminding investors of the 'Sell in May and go away' … [+2687 chars]

articles.title: Wipro's Srinivas Pallia is second-highest paid CEO in industry. His salary is… - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Srinivas Pallia has worked at Wipro for over three decades. His last role was as the CEO for Americas 1, Wipro's biggest and fastest-growing strategic market.

articles.title: 2 Fall Ill After Having Food From Noida McDonald's, Theobroma, Probe On - NDTV
articles.description: The Food Safety and Drug Administration Department (FDA) officials collected samples from an outlet of McDonald's in Noida Sector 18 and Theobroma bakery in Sector 104 following a complaint by a consumer who fell sick allegedly after consuming food.
